K08D0060_H0060:169b-11: de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro //

K08D0060_H0060:169b-13: mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med //
K08D0060_H0060:169b-14: nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste //
K08D0060_H0060:169b-15: chos kun yod pa ma yin no //

K08D0060_H0060:169b-18: gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med //
K08D0060_H0060:169b-19: blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro //
K08D0060_H0060:169b-20: drang po ma yin yon po min //

K08D0060_H0060:170a-2: bden min rdzun min de lta bur //
K08D0060_H0060:170a-3: rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis //

K08D0060_H0060:170a-21: brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi ngad

K08D0060_H0060:171a-15: ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa //
K08D0060_H0060:171a-16: bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can /

K08D0060_H0060:171a-31: mi yi sengge de dag gis //
K08D0060_H0060:171a-32: sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu /
K08D0060_H0060:171b-0: sprul bkye rang ni lha gnas @171b na; ;bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong //
K08D0060_H0060:171b-1: bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang //
K08D0060_H0060:171b-3: rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su //
K08D0060_H0060:171b-5: rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la //

K08D0060_H0060:171b-8: stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:171b-9: de dag zhing du sems can gang //

K08D0060_H0060:172a-5: lha ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag

K08D0060_H0060:172a-13: po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug
K08D0060_H0060:172a-14: cu tshun chad me tog mand'a ra bas pus mo
K08D0060_H0060:172a-15: nub tsam du gang bar byas so //

K08D0060_H0060:172a-28: mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal dang //

K08D0060_H0060:172a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta //
K08D0060_H0060:172a-31: dpag tu med pa'i dge spyod pa //
K08D0060_H0060:172b-0: dpag med ye shes phung po @172b ldan; ;gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can //

K08D0060_H0060:189b-18: 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol //
K08D0060_H0060:189b-19: des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:189b-20: sh'akya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa //
K08D0060_H0060:189b-21: 'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te; ;nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par //
K08D0060_H0060:189b-22: kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta //
K08D0060_H0060:189b-23: 'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyo ba //
K08D0060_H0060:189b-24: sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-2: rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-3: 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-4: sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-5: rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-6: kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-7: de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-8: ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-9: sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bas //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-10: ye shes stobs kyis the tshom gcad du gsol //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-11: mi yi khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-12: the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-13: sangs rgyas slar bsdo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-14: rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
K08D0060_H0060:190a-16: rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
K08D0060_H0060:190a-17: pa / rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-18: 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-19: de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-20: de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-21: 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-22: gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-23: nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-24: dga' ldan lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad //
K08D0060_H0060:190a-25: 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-0: rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes @190b par gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-1: gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-3: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-4: bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-5: de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-6: sngon chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-7: de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-8: skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-9: stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-10: de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-11: 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-12: byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan dang //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-13: gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-14: byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-15: 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ba //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-16: de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-17: lha rnams gang yang de la the tshom med //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-18: byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-19: de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-20: lha tshogs 'di dag rtog pa'i blo ldan te //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-21: mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-22: de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang byung 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-23: gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-24: g-yo ba med pa de la nem nur med //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-25: 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-26: de la'ang lha rnams the tshom yod med do //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-27: chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-28: byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang //
K08D0060_H0060:190b-29: thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-2: blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-3: kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-4: de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'; ;rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-5: 'dren pa skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la //

K08D0060_H0060:191a-7: rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-8: rang byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-9: de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-10: bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-11: de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-12: yi rang gyur cing stobs kyang thob par gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:191a-13: dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08D0060_H0060:191a-15: de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul
K08D0060_H0060:191a-16: dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin
K08D0060_H0060:191a-17: rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de

K08D0060_H0060:211a-8: sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrog pa med par 'gyur //

K08D0060_H0060:211a-10: 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi; ;sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal
K08D0060_H0060:211a-11: pa bye ba brgya grangs gangg'a'i bye snyed 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:211a-12: rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas //
K08D0060_H0060:211a-13: gang yang skyes pa'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na //
K08D0060_H0060:211a-14: bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so //
K08D0060_H0060:211a-15: de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis //
K08D0060_H0060:211a-16: rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min //
K08D0060_H0060:211a-17: de ni au dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-0: de phyir bla @211b na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-1: shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-2: de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dge de 'dra thos gyur nas //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-3: 'khor rnams thams cad yi rang mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-4: khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g-yab mo 'dor bar byed //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-5: dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-6: zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-7: bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-8: khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye rgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-9: sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-10: 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
K08D0060_H0060:211b-13: de nas dge rgyas kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig
K08D0060_H0060:211b-14: phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas 'od
K08D0060_H0060:211b-15: gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong
K08D0060_H0060:211b-16: / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /
K08D0060_H0060:211b-17: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang //
K08D0060_H0060:211b-18: yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing /
K08D0060_H0060:211b-19: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08D0060_H0060:212a-2: chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-3: ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa'
K08D0060_H0060:212a-4: sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad
K08D0060_H0060:212a-5: la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur
K08D0060_H0060:212a-6: zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-7: sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-8: bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-9: sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-10: mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-17: sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-20: lcag gis bzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-24: btson chad ma po la rgyas btab bam /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-25: byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-26: dugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-27: bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-28: 'dam bu bcom pa ltar bcom mam /
K08D0060_H0060:212a-29: 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-1: zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-5: skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-6: byi ba'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-7: nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-8: karsha pa ni tsam du gtubs sam /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-9: 'bras phye btso ba ltar btsos sam /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-10: glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-12: gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-13: bsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad
K08D0060_H0060:212b-14: du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar
K08D0060_H0060:212b-16: bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba yang ma
K08D0060_H0060:212b-17: lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi
K08D0060_H0060:212b-18: 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-19: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K08D0060_H0060:212b-20: des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
K08D0060_H0060:212b-22: gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag
K08D0060_H0060:212b-23: nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig
K08D0060_H0060:212b-24: / gang gis bdag la sgom blud pa de dag dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-25: gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-27: bsti stang du byas pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-28: mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /
K08D0060_H0060:212b-29: gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213a-4: rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du
K08D0060_H0060:213a-5: byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi
K08D0060_H0060:213a-6: bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag
K08D0060_H0060:213a-7: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
K08D0060_H0060:213a-10: de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing /
K08D0060_H0060:213a-12: de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can
K08D0060_H0060:213a-13: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du
K08D0060_H0060:213a-14: shes la brten cing bsnyen la sgom zhing mang du
K08D0060_H0060:213a-15: byed de; de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos
K08D0060_H0060:213a-16: thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
K08D0060_H0060:213a-18: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad
K08D0060_H0060:213a-19: la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par
K08D0060_H0060:213a-20: gyur pa de'i tshe bdud kyi las thams cad kyis
K08D0060_H0060:213a-22: de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213a-23: skye ba la dbang ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213a-25: rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213a-26: yo byad la dbang ba ste /
K08D0060_H0060:213a-27: dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o //
K08D0060_H0060:213a-29: tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K08D0060_H0060:213a-31: bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gnas so //
K08D0060_H0060:213a-32: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08D0060_H0060:213a-33: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K08D0060_H0060:213b-0: @213b de theg pa chen po la yang dag par
K08D0060_H0060:213b-1: zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-2: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-3: ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-4: 'gro ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslab pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-7: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-8: bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-9: chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste /
K08D0060_H0060:213b-11: gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la
K08D0060_H0060:213b-12: nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad
K08D0060_H0060:213b-13: ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o //
K08D0060_H0060:213b-14: de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha rnams kyi ting
K08D0060_H0060:213b-15: nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
K08D0060_H0060:213b-16: pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod
K08D0060_H0060:213b-17: pa / dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste //
K08D0060_H0060:213b-18: ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi //
K08D0060_H0060:213b-19: de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba brgal gyur pa //
K08D0060_H0060:213b-20: thub pa mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba
K08D0060_H0060:213b-21: 'dren pa 'dren la bstod; ;'di na rang bzhin nges
K08D0060_H0060:213b-22: pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te
K08D0060_H0060:213b-23: // sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-1: brnyan ri khrid 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-3: 'di ni sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-4: mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshag cing stong par rnam bzhag la //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-5: rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-6: rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'//
K08D0060_H0060:214a-7: byams pa dge sgom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-8: sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-9: de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-10: des na bde gshegs pa rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-11: bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-12: lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi bar gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-13: de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-14: des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:214a-15: thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal mi gzigs la //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-0: dgyes pa skyes @214b nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-1: de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-2: des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-3: skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-4: 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-5: sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-6: sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'od khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-7: 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-8: gang zhig der rdul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-9: thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-10: sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod par bgyis //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-11: thub pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzad na ma brnyes kyang //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-12: de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsung ma lags bsnyel ba yong mi mnga'//
K08D0060_H0060:214b-13: bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i sgom pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:214b-14: sangs rgyas tshul 'di ni gnas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-0: 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma @215a *//
K08D0060_H0060:215a-1: gyur la; ;tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-2: de ltar gang zhig dran sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma gzigs //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-3: sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-4: thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma rnyed la //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-5: gang gi nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-6: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-7: bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod par bgyis //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-8: 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-9: sgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-10: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-11: sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-12: gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis //
K08D0060_H0060:215a-13: gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang
K08D0060_H0060:215a-14: gang na'ang ma mchis te; ;de bas gang gi bde
K08D0060_H0060:215a-15: ba'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis
K08D0060_H0060:215a-16: // ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-0: ston pa'i tshul @215b mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyis na //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-1: 'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-2: de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod par 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-4: thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-5: 'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-6: yang dag tu ni rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang pa sgom pa mi dmigs te //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-7: chad par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs la //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-8: thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-9: de dag de na nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-10: 'di na mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-11: des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-12: thar par mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:215b-13: rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i
K08D0060_H0060:215b-14: lam 'di sgoms zhes bstan; ;thub pa dbang po dang
K08D0060_H0060:215b-15: ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te
K08D0060_H0060:215b-16: // 'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-1: ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-2: de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-3: de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-4: thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-5: byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-7: 'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma mchis te //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-8: sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis khyod la mchod //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-9: rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-10: brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mthar mar 'byin pa sgoms zhes gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-11: mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g-yo ba ma mchis te //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-12: 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-13: 'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:216a-14: gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-0: 'di dag thams cad g-yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag @216b min nyon mongs min //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-1: 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-2: sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang sgoms zhes gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-3: bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-4: thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-5: 'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-6: stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-7: gsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma rdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-8: gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-9: mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
K08D0060_H0060:216b-10: sems can rnams la bstan; ;sems can mi dmigs gsod
K08D0060_H0060:216b-11: pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra
K08D0060_H0060:216b-12: // gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-13: bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-14: rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:216b-15: sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig
K08D0060_H0060:216b-16: spyod pa 'di bstan pa; ;mkhas pa kun tu dge
K08D0060_H0060:216b-17: ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur

K08D0060_H0060:230a-4: lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
K08D0060_H0060:230a-5: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08D0060_H0060:230a-9: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lags so //
K08D0060_H0060:230a-11: gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na /
K08D0060_H0060:230a-12: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag
K08D0060_H0060:230a-13: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
K08D0060_H0060:230a-18: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni /
K08D0060_H0060:230a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K08D0060_H0060:230a-20: chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur
K08D0060_H0060:230a-22: de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag
K08D0060_H0060:230a-23: brgyad cus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid
K08D0060_H0060:230a-24: la nges pa 'gro ba brjod nas bcom ldan 'das
K08D0060_H0060:230a-25: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan
K08D0060_H0060:230a-26: 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo
K08D0060_H0060:230a-27: sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08D0060_H0060:230a-28: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan
K08D0060_H0060:230a-29: 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
K08D0060_H0060:230a-30: par bstod pa / bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-0: 'gro ba kun la thugs @230b brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-1: 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-2: mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-3: khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-4: khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi g-yo brnyes //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-5: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-6: mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par
K08D0060_H0060:230b-7: 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal; ;phung po rnams ni ngo
K08D0060_H0060:230b-8: bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral
K08D0060_H0060:230b-9: // byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-10: shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre 'u thogs pa bzhin //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-11: grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dong //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-12: khams rnams khams kyi rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-13: dper na brag ca rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-14: des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-15: grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis //
K08D0060_H0060:230b-16: skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-1: zhing byis pa bslu ba chad pa stong ba 'dra //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-2: mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-3: dper na 'gron po rgya mtsho chen por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-4: 'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-5: thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-6: mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-7: bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog chags dag ni rgya la thogs pa bzhin //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-8: sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-9: thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-10: mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-11: mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-12: rten 'byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-13: rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-14: mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-15: mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol //
K08D0060_H0060:231a-16: thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-0: thub pa @231b zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-1: thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-2: de slad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-3: thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g-yo ba med //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-4: thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-5: thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags /
K08D0060_H0060:231b-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-7: mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes zhes smras pa dang //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-8: gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-9: gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-10: de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs pos yongs su dkris //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-11: gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du byed btang bzung smra ba dang //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-12: gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-13: de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-14: chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi //
K08D0060_H0060:231b-15: gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-0: de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos dpal @232a *//
K08D0060_H0060:232a-1: stug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-2: de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-3: de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-4: de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-5: ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-6: kha cig yi rang dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-7: 'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i
K08D0060_H0060:232a-9: lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum
K08D0060_H0060:232a-10: tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par rtogs pa
K08D0060_H0060:232a-11: thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i
K08D0060_H0060:232a-12: rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
K08D0060_H0060:232a-13: tshogs pa dang / do // de nas tshe dang
K08D0060_H0060:232a-14: ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
K08D0060_H0060:232a-16: dpal stug 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-17: rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-18: 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na //
K08D0060_H0060:232a-19: rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-0: de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhal nas 'dzum @232b mdzad bsil mthong nas //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-1: 'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du blta //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-2: mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-3: de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-4: 'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-5: de dag su zhig gang gis ci thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul ba gsungs //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-6: mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs bsgrags te the tshom kun tu bsal du gsol //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-7: de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-8: bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems par //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-9: 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-10: thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-11: des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-12: rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-13: bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-14: de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol //
K08D0060_H0060:232b-15: des ni yid rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-1: chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-2: rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-3: tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-4: 'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
K08D0060_H0060:233a-6: rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
K08D0060_H0060:233a-7: pa / lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-8: rta thul khyod kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-9: gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi tshul dang rgyu //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-10: de khyod bstan gyi khyod dang 'gro brtse gcig yid
K08D0060_H0060:233a-11: kyis nyon; ;thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi
K08D0060_H0060:233a-12: 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-13: rgyu la gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-14: kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-15: kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-16: kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te //
K08D0060_H0060:233a-17: skye bo sdug bsngal lhung ba 'grol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-0: 'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos @233b don du mdzad par shes par bya //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-1: 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-2: 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i
K08D0060_H0060:233b-3: don du shes par bya; ;rab 'bring tha ma rnam
K08D0060_H0060:233b-4: pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te
K08D0060_H0060:233b-5: // kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-6: des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-7: rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhal du nub par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-8: rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-9: 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-10: de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-11: rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-12: sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-13: 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyi //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-14: kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par nyan par gyis //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-15: dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-16: 'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:233b-17: blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-1: don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-2: gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyi rta thul khyod kyis nyan par gyis //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-3: gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la bskor ba byed pa ni //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-4: de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-5: 'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis bskor ba byed par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-6: dal gyis g-yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-7: gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra ba'i
K08D0060_H0060:234a-8: bde gshegs mthong gyur na; ;de ni rkang gnyis dam
K08D0060_H0060:234a-9: pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur
K08D0060_H0060:234a-10: // thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-11: gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-12: gang tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-13: gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum bskor byed pa //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-14: de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-15: bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-16: rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis //
K08D0060_H0060:234a-17: des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-0: de thos gyur @234b nas thams cad mkhyen gyi stan la the tshom med par gyis //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-1: 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-2: zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-3: mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-4: de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-5: de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-6: bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-7: da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-8: gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-9: thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtogs rgyal ba'i
K08D0060_H0060:234b-10: mchog la mchod pa byed; ;rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod
K08D0060_H0060:234b-11: de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas
K08D0060_H0060:234b-12: // de dag de yi 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog /
K08D0060_H0060:234b-13: 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-14: rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-15: sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-16: de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de //
K08D0060_H0060:234b-17: de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-0: gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs @235a *//
K08D0060_H0060:235a-1: bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-2: legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-3: 'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs med 'dus pa des ni ci 'dra ba //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-4: de las nyis 'gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-5: de tshe rgyal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-6: de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-7: bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin pa de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-8: 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-9: de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-10: de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-11: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-12: de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-13: nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-14: de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-15: bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-16: yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin //
K08D0060_H0060:235a-17: mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas //
K08D0060_H0060:235b-0: rkang gnyis dam pa @235b gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te //
K08D0060_H0060:235b-1: thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'//
K08D0060_H0060:235b-2: bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas //
